extendedInfo.description: ##### Attention ##################this theme only run at GO Keyboard 1.8.0 or later.##### Attention ##################Christmas Day is an elaborate theme made by GO Keyboard Team. Wish you like it!Team; Sunshine, sunshade, beach, get this COOL theme to make you GO Keyboard Pro more lovely and colorful.This is a premium theme but free to download. After you download and apply the theme, you can either pay using Google Checkout or get it FREE using Getjar Gold.Getjar gives you free Gold coins for downloading and trying some free apps that it recommends for you. In short, you can get this theme for completely FREE by downloading a few apps.How to get Getjar Gold to purchase and apply this theme:1. After downloading and installing this theme,go to  GOKeyboard menu->Theme Setting->Select Theme click Apply.2. Choose pay with Google Checkout or Free with Getjar Gold. 3. If you choose Getjar Gold, there will be several apps listed. Just download whatever apps you want until you have enough gold to purchase the theme.4. After purchase, select  Apply to use the themeThank you for your continued support. Feel free to contact us if you have any problems or suggestions.GO Keyboard theme gokeyboardtheme

reviews.comment: I hope this App works this will B the 4th App I\'ve brought that doesn\'t work.\tPlease Fix ASAP or refund my money :\'(
reviews.author: Betty L. Johnson Askew M. A
